indian army chief general deepak kapoor says that there are no possibilities of immediate war with pakistan however to defend the country and ensure protection its interests we always ready make sacrifices has said chances an assure safety at all times for giving rejected any possibility he was prepared render interest is protect how ever our sacrifice lives it stated serve they gen depak a fat chance national cost instant defense security her vigilant but india saidthere very little added not imminent in best remain
